summary: Consolidate automation surface and trim unused artifacts

steps.title: Inventory unused assets
steps.notes: Catalogue orphaned scripts, docs, and stale _report data; propose removals

steps.title: Consolidate tooling
steps.notes: Merge or remove redundant automation helpers; ensure remaining tools are covered by tests

steps.title: Document lean baseline
steps.notes: Update automation docs and CHANGELOG with new operating surface and cleanup decisions

checkpoint.description: Repository lean set defined and enforced
